listOfQuestions.question: What is the name of Harry Potter's owl?
What is the name of the Weasley family's magical flying car?
Who is the Half-Blood Prince?
Which house does Luna Lovegood belong to at Hogwarts?
What does the Marauder's Map show?
wrongAnswers: A map of the Forbidden Forest

listOfQuestions.question: What creature serves as the mascot for the Hufflepuff house?
Who is known for always wearing radish earrings?
What is the name of the pub in Hogsmeade frequented by Hogwarts students?
What does the Imperius Curse do?
listOfQuestions.correctAnswer: Gives the caster control over the victim's actions
wrongAnswers: Causes the victim to forget their own name
Turns the victim into a pig
Makes the victim tell the truth

listOfQuestions.question: Which magical creature is known for its invisibility?
What is the name of Hagrid's loyal pet dog?
What is Professor McGonagall's Animagus form?
What is the name of the grumpy caretaker at Hogwarts?
What is the core of Harry's wand?
Which character owns a shop called Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes?
What is the name of the graveyard where Voldemort is resurrected in Goblet of Fire?
What is the name of the female head of Beauxbatons Academy of Magic?
What is the spell to disarm an opponent?
Which Horcrux is destroyed first by Harry and his friends?
Where is the entrance to the Chamber of Secrets located?
Which magical creature guards the entrance to the Ravenclaw common room?
What is the name of the curse that creates a dangerous, skull-shaped cloud of green smoke?
Who is the head of Slytherin house during most of Harry's time at Hogwarts?
What is the name of the ghost of Hufflepuff?
Who does the Sorting Hat originally belong to before becoming a sentient magical object?
What does the boggart in Professor Lupin's class turn into for Harry?
Which character has the ability to transform into a dog?
What kind of dragon does Harry face in the Triwizard Tournament?
What is Sirius Black's nickname?
